content:
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to assist you in setting up your movie watchlist and providing some helpful tips.

I hope you have a blast adding movies to your list and exploring new films from around the world. Don't hesitate to reach out if you need any more help or recommendations.

Remember to enjoy the process of discovering new movies and watching the ones that catch your eye. Happy watching, and I'll see you around!

(If you want to share your watchlist or need more recommendations, feel free to come back and chat with me anytime.)
